subject: Leadership
title: Confirmation Bias in Leadership
description: A fast breakdown of Confirmation Bias in Leadership for builders.

hook.text: Once you form an opinion about someone, you'll find evidence to support it everywhere. Contradictions disappear.

buildup.text: In performance reviews, managers rate the same behavior differently depending on prior impressions of the employee.

discovery.text: Nickerson's review: confirmation bias is the single most pervasive cognitive error in human reasoning and evaluation.

twist.text: Diverse perspectives reduce confirmation bias. When someone sees differently, they challenge your assumptions naturally.

climax.text: Use structured rubrics for evaluations. Seek disconfirming evidence. Ask a colleague to review your reasoning.

punchline.text: The evidence you look for is the evidence you find.

quiz.question: How does diversity help reduce confirmation bias?
options: It doesn't affect bias at all
